---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Report a maintenance or housekeeping task
title: "Maintenance: "
labels: []
assignees: []

---

## Maintenance Guidelines

### Task Description
Describe the maintenance task in detail.

### Impact
What parts of the project does this maintenance affect?

### Expected Outcome
What should be the result of completing this maintenance task?

### Additional Context
Add any other context about the maintenance task here.
